entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening except northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near mainland valleys and inlets before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning except northeast 40 gusting to 60 near mainland valleys and inlets in the morning and afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
